com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.ScanEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.ScanEvent
  • Enclosing interface:
    BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter

    public static class BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.ScanEvent
extends Event
    Instances of this class are passed to BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.onEvent(ScanEvent) to aid in making a decision.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<UUID> advertisedServices()
      A list of UUIDs parsed from scanRecord() as a convenience.
      State.ChangeIntent lastDisconnectIntent()
      See explanation at BleDevice.getLastDisconnectIntent().
      String macAddress()
      Returns the mac address of the discovered device.
      String name_native()
      The unaltered device name retrieved from the native bluetooth stack.
      String name_normalized()
      See BleDevice.getName_normalized() for an explanation.
      BluetoothDevice nativeInstance()
      Other parameters are probably enough to make a decision but this native instance is provided just in case.
      int rssi()
      The RSSI received when the device was discovered.
      byte[] scanRecord()
      The raw scan record received when the device was discovered.
      String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event

        isForAll, isForAny

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • nativeInstance

        public BluetoothDevice nativeInstance()
        Other parameters are probably enough to make a decision but this native instance is provided just in case.

      • advertisedServices

        public List<UUID> advertisedServices()
        A list of UUIDs parsed from scanRecord() as a convenience. May be empty, notably if BleManagerConfig.revertToClassicDiscoveryIfNeeded is invoked.

      • name_native

        public String name_native()
        The unaltered device name retrieved from the native bluetooth stack.

      • name_normalized

        public String name_normalized()
        See BleDevice.getName_normalized() for an explanation.

      • scanRecord

        public byte[] scanRecord()
        The raw scan record received when the device was discovered. May be empty, especially if BleManagerConfig.revertToClassicDiscoveryIfNeeded is invoked.

      • rssi

        public int rssi()
        The RSSI received when the device was discovered.

      • macAddress

        public String macAddress()
        Returns the mac address of the discovered device.

      • lastDisconnectIntent

        public State.ChangeIntent lastDisconnectIntent()
        See explanation at BleDevice.getLastDisconnectIntent().

        TIP: If lastDisconnectIntent() isn't State.ChangeIntent.NULL then most likely you can early-out and return true from BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter.onEvent(ScanEvent) without having to check uuids or names matching, because obviously you've seen and connected to this device before.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
